lender.occupational_info: I work with children and adults to have spiritual retreats in the outdoors or wilderness of Pennsylvania.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: This site affords me the opportunity to assist others financially and is a great platform to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently in the Air Force full time. I'm also a part time real estate investor and author of investment e-books.

lender.name: Letha
lender.loan_because: I think the gift of giving is a privalege I have been given from God to help others.

lender.name: warren
lender.loan_because: I CARE AND SO SHOULD EVERYONE,WERE ALL PARTNERS
lender.occupational_info: I PERFORM MAGIC ON THE STREET,AT THE END OF THE SHOW,I PASS THE HAT,A TERM MEANING I WORK FOR THE TIPS THAT PEOPLE DONATE.I RELY ON THE APPRECIATION OF THE CROWD.WHAT I DO IS ALSO KNOWN AS A ''BUSKER''.

lender.loan_because: We hope to help change lives with our gift
lender.occupational_info: bob- fix medical equipment debbie- fixes people

lender.loan_because: this is one possibility to help underprivileged people who are too many
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching among others intercultural communication hoping to change students' attitudes more unprejudiced

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women succeed in their lives, which will affect the lives of their family and friends. Pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I work with my husband in home construction and run the office while he works on the job sites.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to be self employed and love what I do. I make a good living at it and would like to help others start their business.

lender.name: Angela and Kevin
lender.loan_because: I started my own writing business out of desperation in 2003. It has been the hardest thing I've ever dared to do. My fiance just purchased his own big rig to become an owner/operator transporting frozen foods from Florida to companies in the mid-West states. Most people don't understand the urge that entreprenuers have burning in their souls. I do, we do and want to support others who have that same drive.
lender.occupational_info: I write. I help others put words together to format business plans, grant requests, proposals, and resumes. I help ghost write for authors and even edit and format their books for publication.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Simply to help someone with the same goals and aspirations that I have but are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Event Planner

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I like the concept tof helping people invest in a business to improve their lives.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I think if we connect the whole becomes stronger

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I believe that every individual can make a difference in the world, and that in fact we all do. This is a wonderful way of doing so in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Oslo branch of a Norwegian company which imports and sells machinery, tools, protective clothing & other gear to professional customers in construction and industry. I am an in-house salesperson, serving customers who either visit us in person or who contact us via phone, email or fax. I am proud to be making this tiny contribution to at least some of all the building and other activity that I see going on around me here in the Norwegian capital.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I am a mother (and Grandmother) and want all mothers to be able to provide for their children.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me out when I started my business, now I want to help others with their new dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am a designer of interiors for homes and businesses. I create living spaces in gardens. As an event designer/planner I help people with weddings, holidays, and other life celebrations.

lender.name: JAnis
lender.loan_because: I want to enable women to make a living for their families

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I want to try and make a difference to those individuals who are wanting to work to change their own lives if given a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Taking care of my home, volunteering at church, helping friends and neighbors when in need.

lender.name: Carol (C.J.)
lender.loan_because: It's a terrific feeling being a small part of the whole.

lender.name: Shannan
lender.loan_because: Want to make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: Assist in open heart surgery

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: It's time for us to do something to help.

lender.name: Lane
lender.loan_because: It is better to give than to take.
lender.occupational_info: Use notebook to write software program.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate but not wealthy. This is the perfect affordable way for me to contribute and make a difference.

lender.name: Allen & Cricket
lender.loan_because: I want to help people pursue their dreams and goals.
lender.occupational_info: I handle the shipping and receiving of materials in a wood work shop.

lender.name: Ron
lender.occupational_info: I am the chef at an assisted living facility.

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: It's all about paying it forward.

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because: I realised that I was lucky to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a lab, specialized in plant physiology. I am currently working on tobacco, within a project aiming at reducing smoke toxicity.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving other people a chance to fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase books, videos, and music for a college library and the professional staff.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Its a joy to help and a bigger joy to be repaid (so someone else can be helped).

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: It is exciting to be able to enrich someone's life - someone that one might otherwise never know about or meet. Helping people blossom using their own gifts and skills is my pleasure.
lender.occupational_info: Whenever a teacher needs to be out of his or her classroom, a substitute is needed to keep learning on track for the students - that's where I come in!

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I believe Kiva to be such a wonderful program and I am happy to be able to provide a little assistance to others in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I am always for the under dog in life.
lender.occupational_info: I support ( 8 ) familes in Vietnam and also pay for all the kids schooling.

lender.name: Bette
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women to be self sustaining and resourceful.
lender.occupational_info: I help women who do not have health ins get preventative services.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: No boundaries; no limits; no fears.

lender.name: Eve
lender.loan_because: I believe that small investments made collectively can have a dramatic impact on the lives of hardworking and enterprising people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a healthcare provider to women in a large city family health center.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I am at a point in my life where I am able to give.

lender.name: Dorothea
lender.loan_because: I want to help and give back.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: We should all help out when we can!

lender.name: bill
lender.loan_because: I've always enjoyed the markets I work in, and appreciate the success of my business and good health of my family. Glad to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: buying, warehousing and reselling commodity chemicals

lender.name: The Vargas-Perez Family
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am always looking for ways to give back to the world for the blessings I have received from it. This concept is also an easy sell to friends when I ask them, "how much would you give if you knew you could get it all back?"
lender.occupational_info: Helping adults learn new computer programs.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and want to make a difference by blessing others

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: It is something that I strongly believe in and I must admit that it makes me feel good to be able to help. Small business is a way to grow the world and it is one sector of the world economy that keeps more people employed than large corporations.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the computer industry.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I would go to the market and buy Potatoe chips or cookies,cigarettes, and ice cream.Would total at least 13.00-25.00 monthly for these items . Now, I really do not need to eat or use these products due to the fact I am diabetic.So I figure the money I use to buy fattening foods and cigarettes could be donated for a better purpose.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker and part-time student

lender.name: Annemarie
lender.loan_because: "No one has ever become poor by giving." Anne Frank

lender.name: The Jurgensens
lender.loan_because: GIving is what life is all about. We hope to make a difference in someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: In 2001 we opened our own catering business. It was a very scary adventure for us because we did not have any customers. We have now grown and our reputation for delicious food and great customer service serves us best. We provide food and service at weddings and all different types of celebrations.

lender.name: Gavin and Kim
lender.loan_because: We feel we are blessed in so many ways and we want to do what we can to share those blessings with others.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I want others to become successful business owners and be self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I own a commercial sign company - we design and fabricate signs for small and large businesses. My partner is my husband, Al

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I truly believe that sometimes a person simply needs to be given a chance in order to succeed. So to be a part of that opportunity is wonderful; and an excellent way to "pass it on".
lender.occupational_info: I work at an agency which provides programming and services to individuals (adults and children) who are developmentally disabled. I am able to see first hand each day, how when someone is given a chance to succeed; he/she will take that opportunity and make the most of it.

lender.name: ANN
lender.loan_because: I THINK THERE IS NO GREATER WAY TO SAY THANK YOU FOR THE BLESSINGS I HAVE (FAMILY, FRIENDS, HEALTH) THAN TO GIVE BACK TO OTHERS
lender.occupational_info: I AM A BUSINESS MANAGER OF A MEDICAL PRACTICE THAT TAKES CARE OF CHILDREN. I DO THE BOOK KEEPING, PAYROLL, TAXES, ETC.

lender.name: Jude
lender.loan_because: Giving is the way to a better world. Giving to others helps them better themselves and helps them to give, too.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a "Jack of all Trades", A master of many. Whatever you spend, I'm worth every penny!

lender.name: Jamie & Wendy
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to have a successful business and want to share it with people who are struggling because they don't have the same opportunity and it makes us feel awesome to be able to help in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: Our work is very physical and also very artistic. We create custom concrete finishes for customers for their homes etc. we do driveways, patio's, walkways, countertops, pool decks, floors etc.It is also seasonal because of our winters. We can't pour concrete in really cold weather.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good. We are all connected mysteriously somehow.
lender.occupational_info: Understanding the puzzle pieces that make up who you are and helping you to put your puzzle pieces together, empower you... to create a joyful, peaceful, fulfilling life.

lender.name: Neta
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I have been given and thankful to have the honor to make others' lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a corrugated packaging company, supporting and training customer service and administrative employees using our computer system. I also troubleshoot problem transactions and create reports for managers.

lender.name: SALLY
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and need to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who work hard to process orders for customers for our copier equipment.

lender.name: Rena
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: help clients with their insurance

lender.name: Bob & Sharon
lender.loan_because: It's simply the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We're trying to make the world a better place one step at a time.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: if I can help a few people out there to full fill the goal and dream I want to. It helps to not take little things for granite. so easily. I know how it feels when someone reaches out to help you. Give you a warm feeling inside and you feel like you do matter in this world.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I can and I see it as my responsibility to be a part of making the world a better place. It's a great thing for my kids to see too.
lender.occupational_info: I help people turn their dreams into reality, through the power of visualization and mentorship.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals of self sufficiency and I know a little can do a lot sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I produce and sell 2 different games and organic skincare products. I also sell clothing and jewelry made by others.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurial spirit and want to support those who are working to make life better for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the University of California, San Francisco. I am responsible for ensuring that our patients receive the best healthcare in the world.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: The only thing that truly makes us different is geography. I've had so many people give me a helping-hand and I want to do the same for other women so they can be strong and independent individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my two, young daughters.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I'm selfish, it makes me feel good and I love the idea of giving a "hand up."
lender.occupational_info: I teach math to struggling 7,8, and 9 year old students.

lender.name: Gayle
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people around the world who do not have the advantages that we have here in America.

lender.name: Savanna
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I believe that wealth properly utilized will generate more wealth and contribute to the overall prosperity of our global community.
lender.occupational_info: I help individuals to have a successful business and a successful life.

lender.name: Cesely
lender.loan_because: I want to make an impact on others

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage their money and reach their financial goals

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: We are the wealthiest country in the world. I have been very fortunate in my life. I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find work in the IT industry

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I believe in karma & the power of giving. What you give to world will be returned to you in good spirits.
lender.occupational_info: My work consist of configuring and setting up network infrastructure for the company I work for. I also do Real Estate for the State of Texas.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I love to give.
lender.occupational_info: Admin. Support.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have an opportunity to create a good life for themselves and others. This can only be accomplished if we can create equal opportunities for everyone to do this.

lender.name: Kate, Brian & Maggie
lender.loan_because: I am blessed in so many ways. I want to share in the joy of giving to others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of workers at a warehouse for a large corporation. My husband teaches Physics.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone to help themselves - give them a "hand up", rather than a "hand out". People feel better about themselves that way.
lender.occupational_info: Being retired gives me the ability to be able to volunteer some of my time to manage a local food bank

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: Giving is a gift to myself.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the small details of getting something complex done goes smoothly.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: The Greasted Fulfillment is Giving. I feel a sense of completion when I am helping someone in need and that I have a purpose in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a book keeper for a small Title Company. I came from the Commodities Exchange after 12 years. My work can be tedious and burdensome. But Compared to some of the stories I read about the work load of people around the country, I feel blessed to be where I am.

lender.name: Jiki
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back; not a hand out but a hand up

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: It is a small way for me to connect with someone who needs help. I appreciate the opportunity Kiva provides to do this for those who are working so hard and just need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher, but loved working with children. I now teach Sunday School children and try to practice what I teach about the love Jesus showed all those who were "heavily laden".

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I have so many blessings in my life and would like to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the office of a manufacturing plant. I answer phones, send invoices, pay bills and assist the president and vice president.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in any way that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I assist customers regarding financial adjustments and activity on their accounts.

lender.name: renee

lender.occupational_info: Helping people feel better about themselves

lender.name: Charles Xavier
lender.loan_because: My Mommy is teaching me to be philanthropic!

lender.name: Reno
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mick
lender.occupational_info: I am an announcer on a radio station and an actor.

lender.name: Sheri

lender.occupational_info: Fitness instructor

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I too am self-employed and understand the enormous stress start-up costs cause an owner.

lender.name: Lou

lender.name: Sara

lender.name: Kelly

lender.name: Anthea
lender.loan_because: We can make the world a better place if we try!!!! *****Just one person at a time*****

lender.name: Ria
lender.loan_because: Because I can and I believe in the old saying "a hand up, not a handout".
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired executive assistant., now a happy housewife. I enjoy some traveling and our grandchildren.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: God gave me the means to help someone that would normally not have this opportunity. Even just a small amount is changing these people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my children, husband and home.

lender.name: Coleen
lender.loan_because: I have a two small children and want to instill in them the value of community and sharing. We don't have a lot, but Kiva offers an opportunity to keep on giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medium sized office working on government contracts, supporting the Department of Defense. My main job is to help bring in new business and support current programs.

lender.name: Chad & Tara
lender.loan_because: I especially want to support women in agriculture!

lender.name: Dawn

lender.occupational_info: I am a retired government employee and Josie is a Registered Nurse

lender.loan_because: We should all help each other.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: cyndi
lender.loan_because: I want to give. I hope to help people obtain their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English speaking, listening, writing, and reading to 140 thirteen and fourteen year olds. I also write screenplays, articles, and poetry.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves. I want to invest in people with great ideas to help their dreams come true so they will be able to support their families.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: it's such a small amount to me, but means so much to others..........and it makes me feel good. Good Luck!!
lender.occupational_info: I sell stuff.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: I am selfish and this makes me happy.

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Period.
lender.occupational_info: I help people change their life one thought at a time.

lender.name: kathleen
lender.loan_because: I love the message in the movie Pay It Forward. Hopefully everyone will pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the contracts and radio commercials for our clients.

lender.name: Debby
lender.loan_because: I have received help in the past and now I am fortunate that I am able to help others. It is a wonderful feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for processing payroll for the company I work for. I also take care of the bookkeeping, banking, and produce financial statements.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I recognize how fortunate I am and all people are interconnected on this planet. My wish is that my loan can give the recipient hope for a better future for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: When a change is needed, I plan the project and guide a team to complete the objectives.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: It is a selfish gift on my part. To know that I can help some one with a hand up is a blessing.

lender.name: barlenem
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to help bring opportunity to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people achieve their goals and dreams

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving people in need a chance to a better life whether through education or entrepreneurship, everyone deserves to have an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Tax Accountant in private practice.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I have always had a need for helping others and never really knew how until I saw this on the Oprah show. If I can make a difference for someone else in this world we live in, then I feel that I have accomplished something and fulfilled someone elses dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Everyone knows what the military is, even in another part of the world. We protect. and defend our country so that we may continue to provide the freedom that we have in the United State. We also provide help in times of disasters for the United States and any other country that is in a disastrous situation.

lender.name: sanjay
lender.loan_because: for Medicine store

lender.name: Steve & Mary
lender.loan_because: We believe that the best way to financially help someone is to help them become independent.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I have discovered the joy in giving. What I have given in the past without expecting anything in return has come back to me in more ways than I could have ever imagined.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Improving the life of others gives life more meaning!

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: Having been to many developing countries and working for a Children's Charity, I am very aware of the need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a children's charity called The Smile Train. We provide free cleft surgery for children in developing countries.

lender.name: Jerry & Marilyn

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: It's something small I can do with hopefully a big impact.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: God can use $25 to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: When computers are broken, slow, or acting strange I'm there to remedy the problem.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I design and maintain computer networks. I work with lots of computers to keep them running and up to date.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: we are better together
lender.occupational_info: stay at home mom

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: People who are eager to succeed deserve support. Also, we can show the world America can do more than bomb people.
lender.occupational_info: Before I retired, I worked with computer software. I developed computer systems for businesses. Today as a hobby I still write software.

lender.name: Lyne
lender.loan_because: It's an easy and direct way to help those who truly need it.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: this is an easy to help make a difference in our world. Giving feels great, I highly recommend it. You are helping a family in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a construction field and help other people with ideas on how they can improve thier home and or landscaping.

lender.name: Kim

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: "Do all the good you can, and make as little fuss about it as possible." --Charles Dickens
lender.occupational_info: Travel publishing and Internet development

lender.name: Shanita
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference

lender.name: Paulette
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and feel that sometimes we take things for granted especially some of us living in the US. I feel it is my responsibility to give back because I have so much. I do give back by helping to turn young people's lives around for the better. I wanted to do more and this is one way of doing it on a monetary level. What most of the borrowers are asking for is pittance compared to what we make in this country for a living. I have started several business myself and know what it feels like when trying to get money to start your own business.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a shelter care facility where I deal with males 13-18 who have committed crimes. The majority of them are talented, however most of them lack parental guidance and support. I am like a surrogate mother who nurture and teach not just academic subjects; but also show love, encouragement, and inspire with affirmations on a daily basis. It really feels good to be able to lend a helping hand whether in this country or overseas.

lender.name: Stu
lender.loan_because: I can. I have never had so much fun giving - okay, Sundays can be fun...but this rocks!
lender.occupational_info: I am an Episcopal priest, a local pastor who believes the old, old Story and is discovering with so many others that we are being written into It!

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my daughter and the home. I am thankful that my husband has a good job to allow me to do this.

lender.name: Dina
lender.occupational_info: I help people to go from point A to point B in a caring and safe manner.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: to give people with ambition the opportunity to persue their dreams
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I remember when I was starting my first business and a friend loaned me my initial seed money. The business grew into a success and the loan was repaid. I am now in the position where I can afford to help others.

lender.name: Calgary Clothing Club
lender.loan_because: We get together once a month in what is called "clothing club". A group of us (9 to 10 ladies)- going on 4 years now have been a part of this fun club and now want to contribute to positive change.
lender.occupational_info: We are nurses, teachers, oil and gas professionals and stay at home mommies!

lender.name: Hana
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have been turned down for business loans, because people did not want to take a chance on us. I want to help others with the same problem.
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time as a nurse in intensive care.

lender.name: Rioux
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I did not get to where I'm at by myself. I had goals and people help me accomplish them. So for me being able to give or help someone make a difference in building their lives, Is truly a blessing to myself and others because I can give!

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I know how good it feels to make enough money to buy the necessities. I really want the small business owners to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from substitute teaching. Right now I sell on a auction site on the internet.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: Focusing on someone besides me makes me feel better about myself. I have been blessed, but forget that sometimes. Being a blessing to someone else disrupts the "ME ME ME" syndrome.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money to me can make a tremendous difference to someone in need. I've always been a strong believer in helping someone help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage large projects for a telecommunications company.

lender.name: Cathie
lender.loan_because: What a great opportunity to help someone be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I help to mantain my companies product in the retail accounts. I manager a group of 25 people in several states.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help those that want to improve themselves for their family. It's so little to me but can mean so much to someone else.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: Helping people get started in business is a wonderful thing. It not only helps the person and their family, but it helps the communities as well. Everyone should get involved in this great opportunity to give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the New York City Police Department, which is challenging and rewarding at the same time. Helping people is what we do.

lender.name: Debi
lender.loan_because: I believe this is a great way to help those in need who wish to work.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I love to help people. Although I do not have much money myself being a single mom of 3- I hope to help others with what I have. I know what it is like to struggle as a mom. You want to give your children the world. It hurts not being able to. God Bless!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Hospital in Pennsylvania USA- I am a supervisor for the Outpatient unit. I get to work with 22 girls who I love to help get through their day with a smile. I love to supervise because I know what its like to have an awesome boss. I try my hardest to get each and everyone of them through their day with a smile.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: we can all make a difference

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: It gives me the opportunity to help people in so many locations. Without Kiva I would never know who they are and that they needed help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a vocal and piano instructor. My students range from ages 8 to 70.

lender.name: Theressa
lender.loan_because: It is what God wants us to do and it feels good to help others, "just because"! 2 Corinthians 8:7, 13-14 But just as you excel in everythingin faith, in speech, in knowledge, in complete earnestness and in your love for ussee that you also excel in this grace of giving. ... Our desire is not that others might be relieved while you are hard pressed, but that there might be equality. At the present time your plenty will supply what they need, so that in turn their plenty will supply what you need. Then there will be equality ...
lender.occupational_info: I work with university/college students and develop programs which aid in their personal and professional development as well as their ability to be successful in school.

lender.name: Dawne
lender.loan_because: with a little help people can move mountains
lender.occupational_info: Legal - Administrative work.

lender.name: Mirtha
lender.loan_because: I loan because I've been so fortunate in my life and I wish to share that. I also like the idea of empowering women around the world.

lender.name: Rigel
lender.loan_because: It's a good idea !

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I cannot imagine being so close to realizing a dream and being unable to fulfill it because I don't have access to the money needed.
lender.occupational_info: We supply water and sewer service to our community of 1500 people. We also have the Fire Department and the Park and Recreation Department for the town. I work in the office, helping customers, doing billing, accounts payable and general administrative work.

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: My Fiance' and I seen this site on Oprah yesterday and I felt compelled to contribute. I feel that this is a way for me to impact someone's life in a bigger way than I could've ever imagined. How wonderful is it, that so little goes so far in a different part of world. I've been a Single Mother for most of my daughters life. She's eleven. I've struggled and I've received lots of help without even asking for it. God has put some wonderful people in my life. I wish all of the blessings of the world to you all and best of luck!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Law Firm for a wonderful Attorney. I realize how blessed I am to have a decent job and great bosses. It's not the most challenging job in the world, but it does pay the bills.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to share God's love with others who need a helping hand. Many hands have helped me over the years and now it's my turn! I want to teach my children to be givers too.
lender.occupational_info: I think most people know what nurses do! I care for the sick. I do home health so I get to spend one-on-one time with people and I really love that part of my job.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: It's the gift that keeps on giving--it keeps MY spirit alive too!!
lender.occupational_info: I sell gift items in a store and manage the store as well. It's not my store, I work for a corporation.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I Can

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: it helps other people to support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: People who are able and willing to work for a better life for their families and themselves should get the chance to succeed. Loaning money can greatly help them achieve this goal. I'm happy to be a contributor to their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I clean house, take care of my baby, laundry, cook and do shopping for my home and family.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have a very good life. I believe strongly in helping the unfortunate.

lender.name: Lesli & Mark
lender.loan_because: we should always help those who need it when we have the opportunity.

lender.name: luv swans
lender.loan_because: it is my way of paying it forward and I am blessed to be able to share what I have with someone who tries to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: homemaker retired Dr. office Mgr.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I feel it is our responsibility to help others whenever we are able.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I consider myself blessed and would like to pass it on in whatever little ways that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two little girls and try to keep the housework up as much as possible.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Even though my loan may seem small to some, to others it makes a tremendous difference in their lives. This is amazing to me and I want to be a part of it!
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom raising two children.

lender.name: Ameet & Claire Wadhwani
lender.loan_because:
We loan because we know how much of a difference it can make to help break the cycle of poverty and support people in being self-sufficient and providing for their families.
We loan to compliment the work we support through charitable giving and to create meaningful lasting change.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make the world a better place for my grandchildren.

lender.name: For GGRose
lender.loan_because: To perpetuate the legacy of Grandma Rose's love and hope for all people.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be grateful for, and I want others around the world to be as happy as I am. It always does the heart good to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank that makes large loans to people and businesses. Now, I can do the same thing for those that really need the help.

lender.name: Daphne
lender.loan_because: I believe that it opens up my channel to receive from others and it also makes me feel wonderful!
lender.occupational_info: My work is to use the natural given talents that I have to demonstrate to others that we can have anything we want in life and by doing so, bring all good things to my life.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.occupational_info: Work for an accounting consulting company

lender.name: Jeanicia
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world...I mean I could buy something for myself that I don't need or I could give it to someone for something they need to improve their situation (the choice is simple).
lender.occupational_info: I create pictures for use on television news.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to achieve their goals and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I provide home care for adults with intellectual disabilities.

lender.name: Mare
lender.loan_because: someone once helped me when i needed help
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife and mother, a grandmother, a sister, a daughter, a friend. And i try to make a difference in any way that i can.

lender.name: Toni
lender.occupational_info: I am an office worker. I assist attorneys with their day to day administrative needs.

lender.name: Brianne
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lender.name: don
lender.loan_because: i have been donating for years to various charities... but this one has such a direct and personal impact...and it gives me the chance to give again and again to the world that has blessed me so much.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the federal government of canada and purchase whatever the government needs. but in doing so, i see more of what the world needs more of...like the many people of Kiva...

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: Giving transforms lives. By changing our lives we transform our planet.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to enjoy a happier, healthier and joyful life through coaching and polarity sessions.

lender.name: Tommy
lender.loan_because: I see what people can accomplish when given the opportunity in providing for themselves and their families; That they will do so with great integrity, humility and selflessness.
lender.occupational_info: I provide security for American bases around the world. I'm currently in Kosovo.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Because I want to help others enjoy life to their fulliest. We all need someone's help every once in awhile.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others help themselves. We all need some help once in a while.
lender.occupational_info: Retired commercial carpenter.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Ive lived in the third world and Ive seen third world poverty. At the macro level, this helps.
lender.occupational_info: Work on computer systems for aeroplanes.

lender.name: Reba
lender.loan_because: I have traveled all over the world and have seen the need firsthand. We are blessed as Americans and MUST give back.
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales and am passionate about what I do. I make dreams come true!

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who have less opportunities than I do.

lender.name: JUDI
lender.loan_because: to give back for the many blessings that God has given me and my family.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving to others really defines who we are and makes the world a better place to live in!
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the homes of their dreams to buy and live in!

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: it's so easy
lender.occupational_info: I identify preschoolers with disabilities and set up services for them.

lender.name: Steven & Susan
lender.loan_because: We believe in microcredit,
lender.occupational_info: Steve is in the investment/wealth management business and Sue teaches....

lender.name: Jo L.
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a sure way to help end poverty. Most people don't want a handout, they want HELP!
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales.

lender.name: CRYSTAL & MIKE
lender.loan_because: IT IS THE RIGHT THING TO DO AND WE LOVE TO HELP
lender.occupational_info: I ANSWER PHONES AND DO PAPERWORK FOR A DEMOLITION COMPANY AND MY HUSBAND RUNS A SHOP FOR A HVAC COMPANY

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
People the world over have the same dreams of success and security for their families.
If those of us who have always been blessed can help others, we should do it as one of the responsibilities of being human.
lender.occupational_info: I support educators by helping them to develop teaching materials.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way to positivly impact someone's life and address the issue of global poverty. I strongly belive in lending a helping hand rather than providing a hand-out. I must say that I think Kiva should be working domestically as well as internationally durring this tough economic state. The stronger we are at home the more we will be able to do abroad.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to spend $25 than to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Insurance

lender.name: KivaMom
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to be the best that they can be. I want to give to make an example for my son. Who already has a great heart.

lender.name: Juli
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I teach young adults how to make movies look pretty.

lender.name: Hilda
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a supervisor, an advisor and admin clerk for many Marines.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: sometimes all someone needs is a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: Capturing the spoken word

lender.name: Giannangelo
lender.loan_because: It is a good thing to help someone else have a better life, we are all one family with common needs and desires - if we help our brothers and sisters, we help ourselves - and together, we can grow!
lender.occupational_info: We give workshops on sustainable organic gardening, have a website about how to garden organically and sustainably, and contribute to the local farmers market during the summer

lender.name: tom
lender.loan_because: I want you and your family to have a wonderful life.
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers and school administrators make schools great places for all students to learn.

lender.name: Alex & Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and it's easy. Alex gave his Mom more money to loan through Kiva as a Christmas present!
lender.occupational_info: Alex is a college student with interests in international political economics and journalism. His mother Mary Ann is a writer and editor.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in the "Teach a man to fish" method of helping. This is a perfect way to further that philosophy.
lender.occupational_info: I provide dental services to my patients in a small city in Northwest Indiana, USA.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I admire these people trying to make positive changes in their lives. It's a pleasure to give to those who need. It's even better when they're asking for a hand up, not a hand out.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world!
lender.occupational_info: Program Coordinator for Continuing Education at Pima Community College

lender.name: Ralph and Darlene
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired photographer and my wife works in the retail jewelery business.

lender.name: Tove
lender.loan_because: I want to help people I would normally never have a chance to meet.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nurse, I take care of people who are mentally ill in a large city hospital.

lender.name: Christi
lender.loan_because: I want to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I am a small woman owned masonry contractor.

lender.name: Zohra
lender.loan_because: There's always someone that needs it more than I do and I want to make a change!

lender.name: Millionaire Mommy ND
lender.loan_because: My husband and I achieved financial freedom by operating small businesses of our own. It's my turn to "pay it forward" -- I share the story of my journey from minimum wage to millionaire on my blog. I've pledged my blog's net profits (from advertisers) as no-interest microloans for Kiva entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I feel good helping someone achieve their dream! It's a win-win situation for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a group of doctors.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide opportunities to those individuals seeking what is possible for themselves and who are trying to make a difference in their lives and the lives around them.
lender.occupational_info: I provide, information, guidence, direction and support to those people seeking to buy or sell a home.

lender.name: Lon
lender.loan_because: it creates a continuum of progress and opportunity.

lender.name: Eliana
lender.loan_because: I believe we all deserve a chance at our own success!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am in drug development for the pharma and biotech sector.

lender.name: Earleste
lender.loan_because: I am not able to do what I want to, but if I can help someone who has started and this is their livelihood I am all for helping them. My dream is to feed the hungry 24/7. So if I help this person maybe it helps my spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Basically, I pay my company's bills

lender.name: Marti
lender.occupational_info: I run a Jewish community center, providing social services in the Bronx, New York City

lender.name: Diann
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. And I like the connection with people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math from algebra to calculus.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle of "Pass It On". If I can plant a seed, someone else will water it, and God will make it grow!
lender.occupational_info: I assist lawyers in preparing for trial.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: I was raised in South America and Iran because of my father's business. I met amazing wonderful people, whom I still think of today. I would like to help people around the world provide more for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners motivate and train their employees.

lender.name: Klayton
lender.loan_because: Person to person is the only way this world will improve.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the travel industry.

lender.name: Alsia
lender.loan_because: I like that I can help someone achieve their goal.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the foodservice industry.

lender.name: Aspenglow Services
lender.loan_because: the only way we will ever realize real peace in this world is when everyone is given the same opportunities to succeed and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: Aspenglow Services provides website design and technical support to independent insurance agencies throughout the United States and Canada.

lender.name: Jeff & Blandean
lender.loan_because: IT'S BETTER TO GIVE THAN RECIEVE, IT FELLS GOOD TO HELP PEOPLE' give to those who do not have
lender.occupational_info: I work in a big place that makes cakes and sends them to grocery stores to sell and my husband drives a truck

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It's fun! Really....I love that I can send a little money to actively help someone and, when they pay me back, I can turn around and do it again and again.
lender.occupational_info: I'm essentially an administrative assistant for a non-profit organization. I work a lot in Microsoft Office products (Word, Excel, Access) doing reports, maintaining databases, and livening up boring documents with pictures and fun fonts.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Chef in a high volume restaurant. I also recently started my own business making and selling Jewellery

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering individuals and because I simply enjoy giving.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can. I am not rich by North American standards but what little I can give helps make a difference in someone else's life in another part of the world where they are not as fortunate. I am grateful for being born Canadian and to have the opportunities I have. Women in other parts of the world aren't so lucky and I want to help them. My Mom raised three kids on her own on a nurses salary and we got by alright but if we were in a poor part of the world I know we would of suffered tremendously. I feel for the many single Mom's and children in the third world countries.
lender.occupational_info: Soy una designadora grafica. I create advertisements, pakckaging, websites and illustrations to help promote and market businesses.

lender.name: Ilene
lender.loan_because: I care. I love the idea of helping people be self-sufficient by being able to sustain a business and earn a living. It's the whole "give a fish vs. teach to fish" thing. :) Thanks to Kiva for making it so easy.
lender.occupational_info: people who want to advertise their products in the magazines I work for buy advertising space from me.

lender.name: Stefania
lender.loan_because: It's great to know that with so little I can help someone else to improve his/her life, I feel it is my duty

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Whenever you help someone else out in their time of need it always comes back 10 fold in blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I run a center for soldiers in Vicenza Italy. It's a place where they can come in relax, watch a movie, play video games, read, eat and get away from their daily grind.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: We should all do what we can, no matter how little, and together we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a law firm preparing legal documents for the purchase, sale and/or mortgage of real estate.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: because I believe that I can empower someone to better themselves which in turn enriches their families and hopefully, their communities. Since this is not just a gift, the person receiving the loan has a stake in making the most of their loan and receiving the joy of accomplishment when they pay it back.
lender.occupational_info: I help people reach their dream of owning their own home.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help!
lender.occupational_info: My husband is self-employed. I work as his assistant.

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: I got help to start a business, so I know how important it is, plus entreprenuers are my favourite people.
lender.occupational_info: I help Clients market their brands

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to give back to the community as well as the world in needs.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Emergency Medicine resident physican working in Providence, Rhode Island.

lender.name: Steve and Lisa
lender.loan_because: We believe that people should be given an opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in marketing with large multinational companies

lender.name: Don Gregory
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, give someone a chance at their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retail manager, I manage 463 people in my facility.

lender.name: Linda & Karl
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Everyone wins.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and have a wonderful life. Now it is time to give someone a hand.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I was touched by the story of how/why Kiva.org was created. I love the idea inparticular of women helping women, being able to reach out across the world to others trying to help themselves & their families.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: Video Production

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is in developing countries just to get a helping hand so I lend because I know the money is going toward worthwhile projects that help people to become self sustaining.
lender.occupational_info: Raw food preparation, Feng Shui (Not just the furniture placement) Photography, Natural Sciences, Baking, Recipe Development, Web Design, Print Marketing, Web Video Production, Writing.

lender.name: Char
lender.loan_because: There is no greater feeling than helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Helping others Feel Good every day!

lender.name: Frank and Kathleen
lender.loan_because: we are all of one world ....we can all 'pay it forward'..our greatest gift to humankind is the knowledge that someone really cares and that 'you' whoever/wherever .. are important..welcome to the human race at its best..right here on kiva
lender.occupational_info: we are retired military , Frank works in the Telecommunications field , I am a Western Artist and take care of our tiny horses.

lender.name: YOLANDE
lender.loan_because: it helps others

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: "Charity is not an answer to poverty. It only helps poverty to continue. It creates dependency and takes away individual's initiative to break through the wall of poverty. Unleashing of energy and creativity in each human being is the answer to poverty." Grameen - Banking for the Poor

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I am unbelievably blessed in my life and it just feels natural to help others and pass it on. And come on, we've all needed a loan at some point in our lives.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus and love helping people.

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: everyone should
lender.occupational_info: i work at an art gallery. i am very lucky.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It is the least that I can do to help those who have less than I.
lender.occupational_info: I provide joy and entertainment to the elderly

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like to give back!
lender.occupational_info: Financial work - unfulfilling.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: We in America are blessed and I wish to follow the example of Jesus who reached out to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Currently volunteering so as to help in any way I can.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and want to help those who want to help themselves. It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful idea to help people who do not have the funds to start up their own business. We take life for granted and this is one small step to say thank you for what we are already blessed with.

lender.name: Denise Mildred
lender.loan_because: I feel good about helping to create commerce and affording someone the opportunity to pursue bigger dreams and take better care of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a married mother of two with a background in Accounting and Finance. I have a 15 year career which spans auditing, treasury, finance, lending and consulting.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: So many have a definate desire and drive to succeed but maybe do not have the resources available to many of us. I hope the heartfelt tokens I have offered are beneficial in some small way to helping get someone's life that much closer to sunshine.
lender.occupational_info: Financially planning or mapping our client's lives in order to help reach their goals of starting a family, a business, saving for an important trip or looking toward retirement.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed in the United States and I respect these people from trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I feel especially blessed in my life and wish to "share the wealth."
lender.occupational_info: I photograph special moments to remember.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I started a business with $200.00 and now have a successful business after 9 years.It was hard work and dedication, but with a little financial help and support anyone can be successful.I believe in you!
lender.occupational_info: I have a lavender farm. I grow, harvest, dry,and sell lavender. I also make beauty prouducts.I enjoy my job !

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to feel connected to people in other parts of the world. It is great to see how the money will be used. Mele, I think your jewelry is beautiful and I wish you success.
lender.occupational_info: I help children with disabilities be happy and independent. I also love teaching Isshinryu Karate and dancing hula.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: It's the least we can do. We have everything within grasp of us while billions of people just don't have a chance. I almost bought a new pair of shoes today for $30 but decided I'd go back tomorrow to get them. I don't actually NEED them and when I came home there was an email about this and decided that instead of the shoes I don't NEED I'll give to someone who has a greater need than trendy new shoes.
lender.occupational_info: I serve ridiculously priced food to people who rarely finish it. But it pays for plane tickets to travel the world and visit the less fortunate.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Giving someone a hand up instead of a hand out can change their life without taking away their pride.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find homes.
